review: I had consulted the doctor and it was for muscle pain related. ********* *** **** ** *** *******   I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given.  There was no waiting time when we went. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Doctor was friendly and I am good now.

Dr. Koteshwar Prasad garu have lot of patience in understanding the root issue , does nice counselling. My aunty is treated with knee replacement recently. She got recovered very soon. I highly recommend this doctor
